content-updates.pricing: Update pricing tiers in the pricing section Modify tier features as needed Update featured tier designation
content-updates.features: Add/remove feature cards in features grid Update icons and descriptions Maintain consistent card structure
content-updates.agents: Update agent names and descriptions Add new agents to the grid Maintain gradient background styling
content-updates.testimonials: Update trust badges in hero section Modify customer logos and stats Keep metrics current

styling-updates.colors: Modify CSS variables in :root Update gradient definitions Maintain contrast ratios for accessibility
styling-updates.responsive: Test all breakpoints (768px, 992px, 1200px) Ensure mobile menu works properly Check modal display on mobile

performance.optimization: Keep all assets inline for single-file deployment Minimize JavaScript execution Use CSS animations over JavaScript where possible
performance.loading: Implement progressive enhancement Ensure core content loads first Add loading states for interactive elements

seo.meta-tags: Update title and description tags Add Open Graph tags if needed Include structured data for better search visibility
seo.content: Use semantic HTML elements Include alt text for visual elements Maintain heading hierarchy

deployment.hosting: Can be hosted on any static web server No server-side requirements Single HTML file deployment
deployment.compatibility: - Chrome 90+ - Firefox 88+ - Safari 14+ - Edge 90+ - Mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Chrome Mobile)
deployment.analytics: Add Google Analytics or similar tracking code Track CTA clicks and demo interactions Monitor conversion rates
